content.metaTitle: Villa MIR0149 - Luxury 4-Bed Villa in Jávea €1,285,000
content.metaDescription: Stunning 4-bedroom luxury villa in Cap Martí, Jávea. 1000m² plot, private pool, turnkey delivery. Premium Costa Blanca living from €1,285,000.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0149, an exceptional luxury residence nestled in the prestigious Cap Martí area of Jávea, where Mediterranean elegance meets contemporary sophistication. This magnificent 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom villa sits majestically on a generous 1,000m² plot, offering an exclusive sanctuary just moments from Jávea's pristine beaches and vibrant town center.

Crafted by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, this 165m² architectural masterpiece seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living through expansive windows and thoughtful design. Every detail has been meticulously planned to create a harmonious balance between luxury, comfort, and the breathtaking natural beauty of the Costa Blanca, making this property an unmissable opportunity for discerning buyers seeking the ultimate Mediterranean lifestyle.

locationSection.intro:
Cap Martí represents one of Jávea's most coveted residential areas, where rolling hills meet azure Mediterranean waters in perfect harmony. This exclusive enclave offers residents the perfect balance of tranquil privacy and convenient access to all amenities, with the historic town center, world-class restaurants, and championship golf courses all within easy reach. The area is renowned for its sophisticated atmosphere and stunning natural surroundings, making it a magnet for international buyers seeking premium Costa Blanca real estate.

The strategic location places you minutes from Jávea's famous Arenal Beach, the scenic Cabo de San Antonio nature reserve, and an array of hiking trails that showcase the region's dramatic coastline. With excellent transport links to Alicante Airport and Valencia, plus proximity to international schools and healthcare facilities, Cap Martí offers the ideal base for both permanent residence and luxury holiday living.
highlights: Walking distance to pristine Mediterranean beaches and secluded coves
5 minutes to Jávea town center with premium restaurants and boutiques
Close proximity to prestigious golf courses including Club de Golf Jávea
Easy access to hiking trails and Cabo de San Antonio Natural Park
Excellent connectivity to Alicante Airport (90 minutes) and Valencia (75 minutes)

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0149 showcases the finest in contemporary Mediterranean architecture, where every element has been carefully selected to create a residence of exceptional quality and comfort. The thoughtful design maximizes natural light and outdoor connections while providing spacious, flexible living areas perfect for both relaxation and entertaining.
features: 4 generous bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and en-suite bathrooms
Open-plan living and dining area with panoramic garden views
Fully equipped modern kitchen with premium appliances and finishes
Private swimming pool surrounded by landscaped Mediterranean gardens
Covered terraces and outdoor entertaining spaces with mountain views
Two-car carport with additional parking space
Complete climate control with air conditioning and central heating
Advanced security system and smart home technology
Premium materials throughout including natural stone and high-end fixtures
Turnkey delivery with luxury furnishing package available

content.investmentSection:
The Costa Blanca property market continues to demonstrate remarkable resilience and growth, with Jávea consistently ranking among Spain's most sought-after destinations for luxury real estate investment. Properties in premium locations like Cap Martí have shown consistent appreciation over the past decade, driven by strong international demand from Northern European buyers seeking year-round sunshine and exceptional quality of life. The combination of limited supply in this exclusive area and increasing demand from affluent buyers creates compelling long-term investment fundamentals.

Villa MIR0149 represents an outstanding opportunity to acquire a trophy asset in one of Spain's most prestigious coastal markets. The property's exceptional build quality, prime location, and extensive outdoor space position it perfectly for both personal enjoyment and strong rental yields, with luxury villas in Jávea commanding premium rates throughout the year. With Spain's continued appeal to international residents and the Costa Blanca's established reputation as a luxury destination, this investment offers both lifestyle rewards and solid financial returns.
whyBuySection: Prime location in exclusive Cap Martí with easy beach and town access
Exceptional build quality by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana with premium materials throughout
Generous 1,000m² plot offering privacy, space, and landscaping potential
Turnkey delivery with all luxury amenities included from day one
Strong investment fundamentals in proven luxury Costa Blanca market
Flexible living spaces perfect for families, entertaining, and year-round comfort
Excellent rental potential with high-end finishes and prime Jávea location

faqs.question: What is the total price and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0149 is priced at €1,285,000. We can arrange flexible payment schedules and work with leading Spanish mortgage providers to secure competitive financing options for qualified buyers.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for this property?
faqs.answer: Yes, we partner with Habeno, Spain's leading mortgage specialists, who can secure competitive rates for international buyers. Visit our mortgage link or contact us directly to discuss your financing options.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed and ready for handover?
faqs.answer: As a new construction project by Miralbo Urbana, completion timelines will be confirmed upon reservation. The villa will be delivered turnkey with all amenities installed and ready for immediate occupancy.

faqs.question: What exactly is included in the turnkey delivery?
faqs.answer: The turnkey package includes air conditioning, central heating, security system, fully equipped kitchen, fitted wardrobes, landscaped gardens, swimming pool, and carport. Premium furnishing packages are available as optional extras.

faqs.question: What are the ongoing costs and community fees?
faqs.answer: Annual costs include property tax (IBI), utilities, insurance, and pool maintenance. As a private villa, there are no community fees. We can provide detailed cost breakdowns during viewing appointments.

faqs.question: Is this a good area for rental investment returns?
faqs.answer: Cap Martí is one of Jávea's most desirable rental locations, with luxury villas achieving excellent occupancy rates and premium rental income. The combination of beach proximity, privacy, and high-end amenities makes it very attractive to holiday rental guests.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing of the property?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We can arrange viewings at your convenience, including virtual tours for international buyers. Contact us via WhatsApp at +34 634 044 970 or phone to schedule your private viewing.

faqs.question: What is the complete buying process for international buyers?
faqs.answer: We guide you through every step: viewing, offer negotiation, legal due diligence, mortgage arrangement (if required), signing preliminary contract with deposit, and final completion with keys handover. Our team handles all documentation and liaisons with lawyers and notaries.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0149 represents a rare opportunity to secure a luxury residence in one of the Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations, combining exceptional build quality with an enviable lifestyle in the heart of Jávea's exclusive Cap Martí area. Don't miss this chance to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise - contact our team today via WhatsApp or phone +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and begin your Costa Blanca journey.
